fields.name: Alerady_Escalated_Message
fields.fieldText: This case is already in Escalated status

fields.name: Escalate_Case_Please_Own_Message
fields.fieldText: Please own the case first!

fields.name: No_Case_Contact_Message
fields.fieldText: You must associated a contact with the case before it can be sent to Billing.

fields.name: Refund_Credit_Text
fields.fieldText:
ERROR:

Cases with Sub Reason of "Refund/Credit" need to be approved, please cancel and click "Submit for Approval"
